description: Ministry of Housing and Construction - Regulations made by the Minister of Housing  & Construction under section 43 of the Rent Act No. 7 of 1972 read with sub section (5) Section 2 of the said act was published in the Gaz. Exord. No. 1978/4 dated 01.08.2016 has been approved by the parliament on 26th November, 2016
